mapper.insert: insert into questionnaire_table (quesID, title, detail, publisher, reward, total, attend, createTime, startTime, endTime, command,status,number) values (${quesID},"${title}", "${detail}",${publisher}, ${reward}, ${Infos.getTotal()},${Infos.getAttend()},"${Infos.getCreateTime()}","${Infos.getStartTime()}","${Infos.getEndTime()}", "${command}", "${status}", ${number})
insert into tiankong (tianID, quesID, theorder, mode, title, fill) values (${tianID},${quesID},${theorder},${mode}, "${title}",${fill})
insert into xuanze (xuanID, quesID, theorder, mode, title, choose, choices,fill) values (${xuanID},${quesID},${theorder},${mode}, "${title}",${choose},"${choices}",${fill})
insert into quesResults (quesID, userID, createTime,tiankong, xuanze) values (${quesID},${userID}, "${createTime}","${tiankong}","${xuanze}")
